Voice Recorder

Crafted with precision and user-friendliness in mind, Voice Recorder by SplendApps is a versatile audio recording app tailored for high-quality sound capture and management on mobile devices.

  • ğŸ”§ Adjustable Sample Rate: Set the sample rate from 8 kHz for phone quality to 44 kHz for CD quality recordings.
  • ğŸšï¸ Flexible Bitrate: Options ranging from 32 to 320 kbps to manage the size and quality of your recordings.
  • ğŸŒŠ Live Audio Spectrum Analyzer: A visual tool to monitor audio frequency ranges in real-time.
